root.name: Maestro! Jump in Music
root.description: Maestro! Jump in Music is a music-based platformer for Nintendo DS. The aim of the game is to guide the player's character (the titular 'Maestro') through courses based around classical music and the occasional pop hit by strumming strings, collecting stars and shooting cowboy chickens. The enemy is a big robotic spider called 'Staccato', obviously.
